cms.query.QueryText:
DECLARE @Now DATETIME SET @Now = GETDATE()
UPDATE [Chat_RoomUser] SET [ChatRoomUserKickExpiration] = @KickExpiration, [ChatRoomUserJoinTime] = NULL, ChatRoomUserLastChecking = NULL, [ChatRoomUserLeaveTime] = @Now, ChatRoomUserLastModification = @Now WHERE [ChatRoomUserRoomID] = @RoomID AND [ChatRoomUserChatUserID] = @ChatUserID
